DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect acupuncture laser acupuncture point treatment hypertensive subject .
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim study test effectiveness acupuncture laser acupoint hypertension . The hypothesis : stimulation pattern acupoints acupuncture laser result significant reduction blood pressure . The point go use study : Zusanli ( St36 ) , Tianshu ( St25 ) , Quchi ( LI11 ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 70 year age hypertension ( blood pressure 140/90 mmhg ) . Individuals heart , kidney , thyroid disorder , diabetes , chronic disease illness , neurological disease , skin bleed disorder , currently take drug medication recruit study . A health history questionnaire use screen subject .
